message: Hi luxuxs, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $200. Please let me know if you're interested.
maybe it bit concern to you
While I appreciate your interest, $60 is far below the product's true value. Let's find a compromise. I'm willing to come down to $175.  This is still a good deal for both of us.
i want some profits to make home

I understand you want to make a profit, but $75 is simply not a realistic price. I'm willing to come down to $125, which is still a fair price for both of us. If you're not willing to meet me halfway, I'm going to have to move on to another buyer.
you know how worlds run, be fare

I'm willing to be fair, but $85 is still not an acceptable offer.  I'm prepared to lower my price to $100. This is a good deal for both of us, and it will allow you to make a decent profit.  If you're not willing to compromise, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
